snippet: Syria's state spending is expected to rise 12 percent to 1.55 trillion Syrian pounds ($9.10 billion) next year, driven by higher social support costs, state news agency SANA reported citing a draft budget presented to lawmakers on Sunday....

headline.print_headline: Syria's Government Spending to Increase by 12 Percent in 2015-Agency
headline.main: Syria's Government Spending to Increase by 12 Percent in 2015-Agency

lead_paragraph: Syria's state spending is expected to rise 12 percent to 1.55 trillion Syrian pounds ($9.10 billion) next year, driven by higher social support costs, state news agency SANA reported citing a draft budget presented to lawmakers on Sunday.
